name: 米歇尔·罗克斯
name_full: 米歇尔·罗克斯 Michel Roux Jr.

last_movies.title: 法式家乡菜 第二季
五星级厨神 第一季
厨艺大师：专业人士 第六季
厨艺大师(英版) 第四季
米歇尔的隐秘餐厅 第一季
Kitchen Impossible with Michel Roux Jr
现代西厨开山鼻祖：奥古斯特·埃科菲

introduction: The name Roux has grand connotations in UK kitchens. Indeed Michel Roux Jr. is of almost culinary blue blood. As one of Britain’s most highly respected and best loved chefs, he was a natural choice for the 2013 revamp of classic BBC Two programme Food & Drink.His father Albert Roux and Uncle Michel Roux were the first Brits to achieve three Michelin stars for their London restaurant Le Gavroche. Michel Roux Jr trained in classical French cookery at Le Gavroche, as well as other restaurants in London, Hong Kong and, of course, Paris. This included military service working in the kitchens of the Elysee Palace.Michel also did a stint at The Waterside Inn, in Bray, Berkshire run by his uncle and the first restaurant outside France to hold three Michelin stars for 25 years.Michel returned to Le Gavroche in 1990 and took over the restaurant when his father retired in 1993. He has written several cookbooks and first gained TV recognition appearing on Gordon Ramsay’s Hell’s Kitchen. He became one of the judges on BBC Two’s MasterChef: The Professionals, and fronts BBC Two’s Food & Drink programme.
